title: Anno.1404.Venice.FULL-KaOs
description:
Release-Title:------------[ Anno.1404.Venice.FULL-KaOs ]-   
                                                            
                         -[ STANDALONE ]-                   
                                                            
Language:-----------------[ English ]-                      
                                                            
Archive/Count/Volume:-----[ RAR 62x25MEG = 1.43GIG ]-       
                                                            
Release/Date:-------------[ 12-12-2013 ]-                   
                                                            
Ripped/Packed:------------[ KaOsKrew ]-                     
                                                            
Iso/Crack:----------------[ Razor1911/Reloaded ]-           
                                                            
Ripped/Removed:-----------[ Foreign Audio, Useless Movies ]-
                                                            
Movie/Recode:-------------[ BIK 50% ]-                      
                                                            
Audio/Recode:-------------[ ReBuild ]-                      
                                                            
Texture/Recode:-----------[ Rebuild ]-                      
                                                            
Drivers/Extras:-----------[ DX, VcRedist ]-                 


Step-1:-------[ UnRAR Yourself Or Use Our Install.exe ]-       
                                                               
Step-2:-------[ Run ~Unpack~.bat As Administrator              
                To Unpack/Rebuild ]-                           
              ( Our Install.exe Does This Step For You )       
                                                               
Step-3:-------[ Click Anno1404.exe For Anno1404                
                Click Addon.exe For Venice                     
                Or Use The Created Desktop Shortcuts ]-        
                                                               
You Will Be Asked For A Serial When Starting Venice,           
Select Manual And Use The Provided Keygen Located In The Games 
Root Folder (Keygen.exe) There Is Also A Backup If Your AV     
Software Deleted It.                                           
                                                               
Time: The Total Install Was About 50 Mins With...   8 Cores [*]
                                                    4 Cores [ ]
                                                               
                                                               
Notes:                                                         
                                                               
We Recommend Installing To A Short Path (Like The Install.exe  
Default) As Long Path Names Can Cause Missing Files On Certain 
Games During Rebuild.                                          
Unless You Changed It The Default Extraction Folder Install.exe
Creates Is C:/Games/                                           
This Is Were You Can Find The Games exe.                       
If Install/Rebuild Seems To Freeze Leave It Alone.             
Install/Rebuild Is Normally Very Time/Space Consuming.         
(So Ensure You Have Pleanty Of Space And Patience)             


**GAME-FAILED?**                                             
                                                             
If You Are Left With Empty Folders You Have More Than Likely 
Run Out Of Temporary Hard Drive Space For Decompression.     
Free Up Alot More Space And Reinstall.                       
                                                             
If You Are Missing Textures Or Audio Your Antivirus Has More 
Than Likely Deleted One Of Our Tools, Disable Your AV And    
Install Again.                                               
                                                             
If The Game Will Simply Not Start Check Minimum Requirements,
Update All Your Drivers, Check Our Extras Folder For Missing 
Drivers Or Reg Data What May Have Failed To Install. Also    
Make Sure Your Antivirus Has Not Deleted The Crack/NoDVD     
Or Anything Else It Shouldnt Have.
